article_title: AARP offers consumers free tax-filing assistance
article_text: Free tax help, including assistance with Affordable Care Act tax paperwork, is available throughout the Sacramento area via the AARP Tax-Aide program. It’s geared to low- to middle-income taxpayers, with an emphasis on helping those age 60 and older.

article_metadata.news-keywords: AARP Tax-Aide, AARP, tax preparation, Sacramento, Arden-Dimick Library, Carmichael Library, Folsom Library, Fair Oaks, Citrus Heights, tax filing, tax season, income taxes, IRS

article_summary:
Free tax help, including assistance with Affordable Care Act tax paperwork, is available throughout the Sacramento area via the AARP Tax-Aide program.
It’s geared to low- to middle-income taxpayers, with an emphasis on helping those age 60 and older.
